content.rendered:
Directed by Venky Atluri

Written by P. Sathish Chandra. P. Sathish Chandra. Rajendra Sapre. Balvinder Kaur

Cast Akhil Akkineni (Vikky). Nidhhi Agerwal (Nikky). Izabelle Leite (Margaret). Farah Karimaee (Prashanthi Reddy).Nazia Davison. Nagendra Babu (Nikitha’s father) . Hyper Aadi (Pulla Rao). Ajay (Vishweshwara).Ro Ashika. Raj Awasti (Airport Passenger). Leyton Benta (Student). Raja Chembolu (Kishore). Tiziana Coste (College Dean / Mother). Daniel Eghan (Teacher Mr Eghan). Sammy Jonas Heaney (Dean (Brit) (as Sammy John Heaney)).R.J. Hemant. V. Jayaprakash (Krishna Prasad). Kadambari Kiran (Ranga , Vicky’s relative). Satya Krishnan (Shanti). Nina Kumar (Airport Passenger). Mariia Legun (Teacher Miss Legun). Pavitra Lokesh (Vicky’s aunt (as Pavithra Lokesh)). Anisha Mandhara (Neighbour). Chiara Marcon (Photography student). Seema Morar (Neighbour Seema). Raghav Rudra Mulpuru (Vinod). Kaavya Nayar (Vicky’s Girlfriend). Victor Nita (Neighbour). Bhanu Prakash (Student).Lomesh Pudipeddi. Priyadarshi Pulikonda (Chitti (as Priyadarshi)). Amanda Quach (College student). Zoha Rahman (Bobby’s Girlfriend). Vidyullekha Raman (Linda). Rao Ramesh (Siva Prasad). Leej Ramirez (Dancer). Aransh Reddy (Konda Babu). Satish Saripalli (Nikki’s Uncle). Vinita Sharma (Airport Traveller). Joanna Shegera (Student Joan). Rajeshri Sheth (Neighbour Rajeshri). Gabrielle Singh (Student). Sithara (Nikitha’s mother). Ayvianna Snow (Policewoman PC Snow). Subbaraju (Ramesh Babu). S. Thaman (Special Appearance in ‘Kopamga Kopamga’ Song). Glenn Webster (Police Officer PC Webster). Stuart Whelan (Teacher)

Languages Telugu

Producers Bhogavalli Bapineedu. Krshna Naganpillai. Navneeth Nagan Pillai. B.V.S.N. Prasad. Yogesh Sudhakara Mallineni. P. Rupak Pranav Tej

Production Goldmines Telefilm. Sri Venkateswara Cine Chitr
